title: William Low: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: The award-winning painter and illustrator appeared at the Apple Store, SoHo to discuss his gorgeous illustrated book, Old Penn Station. Low explains his digital painting technique and his approach to creating glorious images that have a reputation for exploiting light and color and with which viewers often find an emotional connection.
itunes:summary: The award-winning painter and illustrator appeared at the Apple Store, SoHo to discuss his gorgeous illustrated book, Old Penn Station. Low explains his digital painting technique and his approach to creating glorious images that have a reputation for exploiting light and color and with which viewers often find an emotional connection.
itunes:keywords: William Low, Old Penn Station, Penn Station, illustrator, illustrations, digital painting, digital illustration, children's books, childrens book, kids' books, author, interview, apple store
